transcript:
Customer: Hello, sollunga sir.
Executive: Good morning, IndiaMART.
Customer: Sollunga sir.
Executive: Call pannirundhingala?
Customer: Illa illa illa. Theriyama vandhuruchu sir. Theriyama call poiruchu.
Executive: Okay ma'am. Onnum illa ma'am. Customer ku oru ticket concern rise aayirukku. Neenga customer ku oru call panninga la? Issue endra maari rise aayirukku. So, adhu close pannikalaam la ma'am, with your permission?
Customer: Puriyala sir.
Executive: Sir, neenga 96 call pannom la ma'am?
Customer: Aama aama. Adhu close pannirunga. Theriyama call vandhuruchu.
Executive: Okay ma'am. Just oru feedback mattum varum ma'am. Mail la oru feedback mattum varum. So, adhu mattum konjam kuduthudiringala?
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: Okay okay ma'am. Vera edhaavathu concern irukku la ma'am? Vera edhaavathu issue irukku la?
Customer: Illa illa sir. Idhu indha naanga oru recently oru bricks vaangirundhom.
Ippo ippo naanga IndiaMART mooliyamaa vaangi andha product sari illa appidinaa naanga edhaachum issue raise pannalaamaa?
Executive: IndiaMART la irundhu neenga product purchase pannirukingala?
Customer: Aama. Naan actually anga irundhu dhaan vandhu seller paarthen.
Executive: Product vandhu issue endringala? Product quality illa andha maari solringala? Illa enna enna issue?
Customer: Aama product quality.
Executive: Buyer seller la pesikira maari irukkum ma'am.
Customer: Okay okay okay sir okay.
Executive: Company name solringala?
Customer: Andha maari quality issues vandhadhu ya.
Diamond Engineering Company.
Executive: Enge location?
Customer: Puriyala sir.
Executive: Enge location?
Customer: Chennai sir. One second location.
Executive: Company name Diamond?
Customer: Diamond Engineering Company.
Customer: Tondra patents something irukku.
Executive: Avanga mobile number irukku ma'am? Mobile number irundha sollambudingala? Adhula andha number la irundhu dhaan neraiya varudhu.
Customer: Okay enna sir?
Executive: Andha company name la neraiya company register aayirukku. Avanga mobile number solringala?
Customer: 9500
Executive: 9500
Customer: 12
Executive: 12
Customer: 578.
Executive: Okay ma'am. Selvakumaran kaattingala avaru name?
Customer: Owner name enakku theriyala.
Customer: Avanga kittaka purchase pannirundhom. Aama aama Selvakumaran.
Executive: Rubber products la pannuraaru. Bricks la pannuraaru. Bio gas bricks nu pannuraaru. Chennai location.
Executive: Actually enna enna issue product wise enna issue?
Customer: Romba worst quality sir.
Customer: Okay sir. Sir andha ippo naan feedback mattum kodukkanumgala?
Executive: One second ma'am.
Executive: Adha neenga call panninga la customer care ku. So call pannunaale ungalukku oru concern maari rise aayirukku. Indha maari client ku issue illa maari vandhu oru concern maari rise aayirukku. So adhukku dhaan naan ungalukku call pannen enna issue endru solli kekkalaam nu.
Executive: Ippo permission koduthu close pannikalaam la? Illa vera edhaavathu?
Customer: Close pannidunga close pannidunga.
Executive: Just a minute ma'am.
Executive: Account manager number irukku la ma'am ungalukitte?
Customer: Illa sir. Endha account manager sir?
Executive: Namakku account manager assign panniruppaangala?
Customer: Illa illa avanga number illa naan save pannala. Maybe call panniruppaanga naan pannala.
Executive: Okay. Okay avangale vandhu WhatsApp la text panna solluringa number save pannikkonga. So edhaavathu issue appidinaa neenga IndiaMART ku call pannunaa neenga direct ah account manager ku neenga connect pannalaam. Yenna indha maari customer care ku call pannom appidinaa namma page la dhaan vandhu oru remark maari idhaagum. Indha maari issue face pannrom endra maari.
Customer: Okay sir. Service la edhaavathu issue edhaavathu doubts appidi inform pannum appidinaa direct ah neenga account manager ku neenga contact pannalaam. Saringala?
Customer: Okay. Indha TrustSeal nu oru oru idhu irukku la?
Executive: Aama ma'am.
Customer: Indha oru page ku adhu vandhu eppadi sir adhu varudhu?
Executive: Adhu vandhu idhula irundhu oru premium service maari ma'am. Ippo namma basic service irukkom paathingala?
Customer: Aama.
Executive: So adhula irundhu just oru step ahead ah paathingala TrustSeal nu sollittu premium practice irukku.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Appidinaa ippo neenga IndiaMART la basic service la entry aayittingala? Idhu vandhu MDC service nu solluvom. Mini catalog nu solluvom. Catalog service nu solluvom. Idhu vandhu nammudaiya GST locations la mattum namma company vandhu promote aagum.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Like neenga ippo Kanchipuram, Chengalpet la vandhu namma GST file pannirukkom paathingala? So andha location la nearest customers ku mattum first listing la paathingala company name vandhu project aayittu irukku.
Executive: TrustSeal service appidingarathu premium service pogumbodhu neenga enna enna locations la major ah buying selling concern pannuringalo andha locations la ellaame namma company name vandhu listing la varum. Deals in Chennai, deals in Coimbatore, deals in Bangalore, deals in Hyderabad appidindra maari multiple locations la listing la varum.
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: Certificate ku paathingala provide aagum.
Executive: IndiaMART la neenga oru verithiyaana client customer andha maari paathuttu certificate offline and online rendu layume paathingala ungalukku provide aagum.
Customer: Okay sir naan later ah paakkaren enakku feedback mattum send pannunga naan anupparen.
Executive: Okay ma'am naan ungalukku 10 minutes la ungalukku mail ku mattum review aayidum. So adhu mattum konjam confirm panni vidunga saringala ma'am.
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: Thank you thank you.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Received an unknown call from the executive.

- Enquired about raising issue for product bought via IndiaMART.

- Product quality was very poor.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed to close the ticket.

- Executive explained about TrustSeal service.

- Executive explained benefits of TrustSeal service.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send feedback form to customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- product quality, trustseal, feedback
